Text:
Unfortunetly I have had a difficult time finding footage of US soldiers killing Iraqis.
I was in Iraq for a year myself in 2003-2004 and video cameras were a big no-no.
When I post another complation I will include the few I have found and look for some more :)
Thanks for Downloading!
good to see some iraqi people paying back the yank terrorists for invading and destroying their country
